original_text: “Assyria is there with her whole army; she is surrounded by the graves of all her slain, all who have fallen by the sword.
korean_text: 거기에 앗수르와 그 온 무리가 있음이여 다 죽임을 당하여 칼에 엎드러진 자라 그 무덤이 그 사방에 있도다

sentences.original_text: Assyria is there with her whole army
sentences.korean_translation: 앗수르는 그 온 군대와 함께 거기에 있도다

sentences.original_text: she is surrounded by the graves
all who have fallen by the sword
